price: Ese día no podrán los familiares ayudarse entre sí, nadie recibirá socorro,
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي مَوۡلًى عَن مَّوۡلٗى شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yugh'nī mawlan ʿan mawlan shayan walā hum yunṣarūna
